TextBody:
Hello,

I inquired about this matter and I received the information that this time server isn't being handled by the EPP appliance, it's an independend time server so you should research and see if that is the correct port.
I can share with you an unofficial list of other time servers as an example, that I found online:
https://gist.github.com/mutin-sa/eea1c396b1e610a2da1e5550d94b0453

Best regards,
Alin Anca

Technical Support Engineer
Endpoint Protector by CoSoSys, now part of Netwrix - DLP | Device Control | Content Aware Protection | eDiscovery | Enforced Encryption
CoSoSys Ltd www.endpointprotector.com

Thank you,
Best regards,
Alin Anca

We found information that port UDP 123 should be allowed, is this correct?
Could you please confirm?
